targets.query: from(bucket: "metrics") |> range(start: -30m) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_requests" and r._field == "latency_ms" and r.profile == "viz") |> group(columns: ["_field"]) |> window(every: 1m) |> quantile(q: 0.95, method: "estimate_tdigest") |> duplicate(column: "_stop", as: "_time") |> window(every: inf)

from(bucket: "metrics") |> range(start: -30m) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "http_requests" and r._field == "latency_ms" and r.profile == "viz") |> group(columns: ["_field"]) |> window(every: 1m) |> quantile(q: 0.95, method: "estimate_tdigest") |> duplicate(column: "_stop", as: "_time") |> window(every: inf)
from(bucket: "_monitoring") |> range(start: -30m) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "runtime" and r._field == "Alloc") |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
from(bucket: "_monitoring") |> range(start: -30m) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "runtime" and r._field == "Alloc") |> aggregateWindow(every: 30s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
